title: Unable to login to account
description: Customer reports login failing with 'invalid credentials' even after password reset link used.

title: Payment failed at checkout
description: Transaction hangs at processing step; card is charged but order not created.

title: Request for invoice correction
description: Invoice #INV-2025-089 shows incorrect VAT amount; customer requests correction and reissue.

title: Mobile app crash on startup
description: App crashes immediately on launch for several Android 12 devices.

title: Feature request: export CSV
description: Customer requests ability to export ticket lists to CSV with custom columns.

title: Reset two-factor authentication
description: Customer lost access to authenticator app and needs 2FA reset after identity verification.

title: Slow page load on dashboard
description: Dashboard page takes over 12s to load when filtering by date range.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customer stopped receiving ticket-update emails since last week; SMTP appears configured.

title: Unable to upload attachments
description: Attachments larger than 2MB fail with 'upload error' even though limit is 10MB.

title: Account cancellation request
description: Customer requests immediate account cancellation and data export before closing.
